headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Survivals and More
content:
Trouble takes all shapes this week: whether its Vagos, Ballas, armed tweakers, or the military wreaking havoc across all sorts of locales, staving off wave after wave of unrelenting enemies in Survivals is paying out 2X GTA$ and RP to all participants for the next seven days.

Plus, Business Battles are awarding triple the usual money and RP.
